text:
Software Engineer/Tech Lead | Zenysis (YC W16) | SF | Onsite

Zenysis helps governments and international organizations analyze their data for insights that save lives.

Developing countries are using Zenysis right now to deliver emergency aid to millions of people in need, stop infectious disease outbreaks, deliver lifesaving vaccines to millions of children, and more.

As employee #1, you'll lead development of our data integration and analysis platform, working closely with the founders to grow the company. You will also travel around the world to connect with vastly underserved populations, understand their problems, and build software that will impact entire countries.

Email ian@zenysis.com if you're interested. Some more info here: http://www.zenysis.com/jobs.html
